name: 范書愷
objective: 欲使工業產品與生產程序更具生態化效率，本課程將專注於講述如何降低生產程序/作業流程對環境的影響。綠色生產即意味著永續、環境化友善設計、綠色工廠、與同步整合性產品與製程設計。本課程將教授RoHS法令、WEEE法令內容、智慧型永續企業工程設計系統、產品生命週期管理、與產品終期分析等課題。
schedule:
1. Keeping Up with the Latest Advancements in APC A Tutorial
2. R2R Control and FDC Selected Topics
3. The Prediction Landscape
4. Chamber Matching
5. Big Data
6. Implementing Virtual Metrology from the Ground Up
scorePolicy:
1. Participation 30%
2. Paper Reading Report 30%
3. Final Presentation 40%
materials: Handouts will be distributed in class.
